content.rendered:
Directed by Merlapaka Gandhi.

Written by Arjun. Carthyk. Carthyk-Arjun. Merlapaka Gandhi. Karthik Rapolu.

Cast Nani(Krishna / Arjun). Anupama Parameswaran(Subba Lakshmi (as Anupama Parameshwaran)). Rukshar Dhillon((as Rukshar Mir)). Brahmaji(Arjun’s manager). Devadarshini Chetan(Subbalakshmi’s aunt). Nagineedu(Riya’s grandfather). Prabhas Sreenu(Shankar). Sambhola Hari(Shankar’s wife). Vidyullekha Raman(Call Center Girl). Pooja Ramachandran(Nikki). Lakshmi Alapati(Krishna’s mother). Kalpalatha(Riya’s mother). Ravi Awana(Bhai). Chandra Sekhar(Bhai’s henchmen). R.J. Hemant(TV Journalist). Neelya Bhavani(Doctor). Ruhika Dass(Jessy) .Master Aarya.Adithya.Avinash.Arc Babu.Chintu. Penchal Das(Special Appearance).Deepak.Uma Devi.Nagaraju Dhevadi.Dhruv.Giri.Jashuva.Jhansi.R K.Lathanadh.Lenin.Madhavi.Thotapalli Madhu.G.R. Maharshi.Mahendar.Mahesh.Maruthi.Mourya.Murali.Dmk Murali.Narasimha.Padmavathi.Rabbani.Rajeshwari.Writer Ramesh.Padma Rao. Deepak Ravella(Rahul).Shraavya Reddy.Srikanth Reddy.Seenu.Shaking Seshu.Lab Sharath.Shiva.Sivannarayana.Jl Sreenivas.Subbu.Sudharshan.Silver Suresh.Swamy.Swetha.Hari Teja.Tharani.Temper Vamsi.Surya Varma.Inturi Vasu.Venkat.Gagan Vihari.Mahesh Vitta.Rajesh Vulli

Language Telugu.

Producers Venkat Boyanapalli. Ivano Fucci. Sahu Garapati. Venkat Krishnamaneni. Nagamohan Babu M.. Harish Peddi. Narayana Swamy S.. S. Venkatarathnam.

Production Shine Screens.
